content: the pattern is made-to-measure so for every size almost any yarn weight and hook size can be used you can choose the length and ease yourself so everything is possible from crop tops to dresses / beach cover-ups the pattern includes a pdf 14 pages with a step-by-step tutorial with photos required skills beginner with basic knowledge language english us terms what you need yarn no specific weight matching crochet hook for your yarn measuring tape stitch markers scissors needle terms of use - you agree this terms when you purchase this pattern - this pattern is for your personal use only it s not allowed to share it in any way like copying for someone else or publishing a video tutorial or parts of the pattern - you can sell your finished product but have to credit me as the designer instagram handmade_by_bella mue only use your own photos for selling your product not mine or others - you are not allowed to do a mass production
